snippet: Roger Attfield, a top Canadian trainer, was inducted to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame, but his home track in Ontario faces an uncertain future.
lead_paragraph: Roger Attfield, a top Canadian trainer, was inducted to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame, but his home track in Ontario faces an uncertain future.

headline.seo: Horse Trainer Attfield Worries About Woodbine Track
headline.main: For Canadian Trainer, Hall of Fame Honors and Big Worries About Future
headline.print_headline: For Canadian Trainer, Hall of Fame Honors and Big Worries About Future
